analysis.description:
INX.constructor (/unique_chucks/22/0x889e06ff74e15a446275511ea3b6635bb5a608e2.sol#112-128) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(address(this).balance == 0)

INX._decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x889e06ff74e15a446275511ea3b6635bb5a608e2.sol#100-101)
INX._name should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x889e06ff74e15a446275511ea3b6635bb5a608e2.sol#97-99)
INX._symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x889e06ff74e15a446275511ea3b6635bb5a608e2.sol#99-100)
